name: SHAIKH AHMED SAEED
description:
Over 15 years of experience as an Imam, a teacher of Quran and Islamic Studies, proficient in Quran recitation and Hadeeth sciences.

Ijaza in Qur'an of riwayat-Hafs.

Imam at Al-Aelat mosque, Egypt delivering Jummah Khutbas

Teaching Quran and Islamic studies at Fawaris Ahl Sunnaha, Egypt

Imam at OIAC since 2021
